| * Ensure “Input Materials” (Raw Material & WIP) and Finished Goods are recorded on separate NCAs and that the Control of Non-Conforming Product Procedure is adhered to for both incidents. * If WIP is found to be non-conforming from an in-house process. ‘Non-Conforming Process Department’ to ensure that Immediate Correction / Action is taken of NCA taken place. * NCA number to be recorded on Production Log Sheet in line with relevant cartons numbers and time of occurrence. | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |
